node.doctext:
Is there a preview option when updating a node, like there is when creating a new node?

No, there currently is no preview option when updating.

Preview for updates is a [id://461152|desired feature] and is [id://729004|technically possible], but simply has [id://729004|not yet] been [id://461152|implemented] by a [pmdev]il. It is also not a priority as substantial updates are discouraged. A substantial update should usually instead be done as a reply, so that people who are trying to follow the thread can notice that something substantial has been added.
